name: Ultra6000
description:
Cute, simple and engaging scroller. Avoid the bad bugs and eat bonuses. Game is designed for personal arcade (based on Raspberry Pi / Godot Engine).

Pure fun.
Keyboard recommended but Xbox360 is also supported.

enos16 palette

Key features:

  • easy / hard option
  • procedural map, never ending fun
  • runs on Raspberry Pi Zero
  • 200x150 (4:3) resolution
  • enos16 (+black) palette
  • easy to play but harder to master than you think

Source code:

  • https://github.com/w84death/dr-worm

Experimental HTML5 build:

  • http://pub.p1x.in/ultra6k/
